entity.author: None
entity.title: Application preferences for a given userLogin.
entity.description: The UserPreference entity contains one entry per preference per userLogin. User preferences are stored as key/value pairs (userPrefTypeId/userPrefValue). All values are stored as strings. Value strings can be converted to other data types by specifying a java data type in the userPrefDataType field.
